about_the_game:
In the first-person single-player game USS Tempest: Spaceship Simulator you take a journey through the stars and experience the ultimate mission of leading the fate of the spaceship and the crew. Set course to known space and gather the necessary resources to keep the ship running. Along the way, you will explore different events and planets.


Experience first-person shooter action and puzzles in the story missions.


Encounter different randomized situations onboard the ship.


If you allow visitors to explore your ship or services, you will have the chance to gather additional resources or to recruit them.


Space is a dangerous place! System failures, Hostile Environments, Attacks… Be prepared and invest in defense mechanisms.


Grow plants, upgrade the existing systems and establish new services to attract visitors. Do everything necessary to make your life easier!

Key Features:

  • Fight your way back home - Peacefully or with violence
  • Survive- Trade, maintain the ship and upgrade the systems
  • Explore - Events, Unknown Space and the USS Tempest

content_descriptors.notes: Violence, Guns, Use of Alcohol, Strong Language

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790S / AMD FX-9590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Resolution of 1024x768

  • OS: Windows 10
